Overview

Currently the group is focusing on two different areas:

  • LPC Dark Matter & Substructure (LPC-DM&S): searches involving large missing transverse momentum and jets, in the frame of the CMS-EXO-MET+X group
  • LPC Dark Matter & Lepton-Jets (LPC-DM&LJ): searches involving long-lived particles, in the frame of the CMS-EXO-LLP group
